physical_appearance: "The image displays an illustration from a book. There is a white border around the illustration. The illustration is a drawing of the interior of a hotel room with two single beds. Two men are sleeping, one on each bed. Both beds have mosquito nets hung on their frames. A ceiling fan can be seen prominently and there are several bags and boxes with locks on them. The initials ""SJP"" can be seen clearly on one of the bags
